description: Shower head Installation tips…I use tape and dope to prevent leaks. I also tape the shower arm and apply it a few inches beyond the threads so that it can be pulled off after the head is installed. Pads for Knipex pliers wrench won’t scratch the chrome 🙌🏽🔥#plumbing #showerhead #bathroomremodel
title: Shower Head Installation Tips - #shorts #homerepairtutor
